name: filesystem_base_route_api
description: - [ ] - Under the API folder the directory structure is used to define the route. - [ ] - Only the route.js|ts are recognized as route files. - [ ] - Functions exported by these files need to have the name of a supported HTTP method (this is to define the HTTP method of the route) - [ ] - A route file can export more than one method function - [ ] - Exported functions need to have access to the Request and Response objects
